<<New page is spotted! Fill it with comments!>> [MISSION UPDATE]

"The C-5 is better than you and it's literally a CARGO PLAN-"

Climbing the Citadel from Half-Life 2

"Ow my stumps of hands!"

Reviving yourself after half a year on the KSP forums

"Wow, I feel so tired I bet I could sleep for a year."

Playing in the games thread when all the regulars have given up.

Why are we still here? Just to suffer?

Traveling through the abyss

“There hasn’t been even an injury in 35 years in a non-military subs.”

Making a new prompt.

Edited May 28 by BA-Forums
I forgot rules lol

no prompt so

"Lads, I've done it! I've built a self-propelling nuclear bo-"

Attempting to fly an airplane

"Reins work on planes right?"

Trying to follow the initial plan to release a sequel game in 2 years.

“We’re killing the Kraken.”

Responding to a cringey comment.

"I am sure they won't just snip my reply while leaving up the offending remarks for weeks"

Warning people of danger.

“Greek steamer Athinai reports passing icebergs and a large quantity of field ice today in latitude 41°51’N, longitude 49°9’W… wish you and Titanic all success.”

Letting your kid cousin borrow your iPad during the family reunion.

"Please be careful not to break it."

Cooking for yourself.

"And add salt to taste."

Swerving 90 degrees on the runway in a high-performance jet while on takeoff.

I am sure the centre of gravity is low enough not to flip multiple times and smash into tiny bits.

Being the first to try something new.

"Don't worry, this should be perfectly safe"

Picking your dropped phone up from the train tracks

"I feel a breeze."

Trying to guess how to do things in Blender.

ok how do i fill in this gap.

 

trying to learn to make KSP parts.

I am going to join the Forum where all the friendly people will explain to me how to make things, not make me spend years learning from trial and error till I end up starting a thread myself to help others by passing on what I have learnt. (Hmm, that was oddly specific.)

Making a thread that is meant to remain positive.

"This thread is only for the discussion of [INSERT TOPIC]. Please remain civil and within the forum's rules and regulations."

Trying to start a Minecraft server with extremely impatient players.

"I am sure if I let players know I plan to this before I implement it that they will be understanding."

Trying to build a complex world on a Minecraft server.

"Remember guys, no griefing!"

Playing in any multiplayer game.

"I am sure the server can handle 200 people all randomly doing their own thing in a virtual space at the same time while their interactions affect the interactions of everybody else in an exponentially growing, chaotic confluence."

Trying to 3D model while also interacting on the forum.

"I hope I don't accidentally delete the model I've been working for the last 20 hours on - *clicks delete button* - oh dang"

Jumping out of a plane (hopefully) with a parachute on

Edited June 23 by tryharder

"Hey, don't push me out yet, I haven't completed my checklistttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttt"

Being a passenger on a plane in a Twilight movie.

"Screaming"

Removing the borders
